features: ✅ 2 Bird Shape Lamps and 3 Bottles of Essential Oil - The small bedside table lamps design inspiration are from the free birds outside of window. The surface of the bird lamp is finely polished and will never fade, giving it a modern, simple and exquisite style. Not only can it be used as a regular bedside nightlight, connected to a USB power supply, but it can also be used as a camping light.The package includes two bird lights in mahogany and maple and three of the most popular aromatherapy.

✅ 3 Brightness and Touch Control - The small kids cute led desk lamp features a cordless design and a touch dimming system. There are three light colors: white, neutral and warm. Short press to change color, long press to change brightness.You can adjust the lighting according to your needs.It can be used as a desk lamp,office lamp,computer side lamp, brightness up to 6000K. Its highest setting provides extra brightness for comfortable reading or parenting purposes without disturbing your sleep.

✅ Aroma Diffuser Function(3-4 drops essential oil each time) - The small cordless table lamps rechargeable has an essential oil hole on the top, which can be used as an aroma diffuser when reading. Warm reminder: When using the lamp for reading or sleeping, please do not add too much essential oil into the hole. Only add 3-4 drops of essential oil each time to avoid damaging the lamp.

✅ Eye Protection and Energy Saving - The double bird led table lamp adopts eye-friendly 90° Irradition Angle design and the PC lampshade is durable and can reduce radiation, both of which are unique designs to protect the eyes of your family and kids.There is a universal USB charging port under the bird's tail and a built-in large-capacity 1800 mAh rechargeable battery.It can be used continuously for 4 hours in the brightest state and for 1 week in the darkest state, which is very energy-saving.

✅ Exquisite Home Decorations and Perfect Gifts for Bird Lovers - The bird night light can not only be used as a eye-catching and colorful decoration for the bedroom and living room, but also a unique gift for family or friends, such as Thanksgiving, Christmas, housewarming and birthday. It can also be used as a car aromatherapy lamp and decorate cars. If you have any questions about the table lamps, please feel free to contact us for 100% refund or replacement!

Bird night light can be simply placed as a decorative piece in the bedroom, living room or on the bedside table. They can also function as a nightstand lamp, reading lamp, camping lamp, kids nursery lamp, night lamp, table lamp, bedside lamp, bedroom lamp or desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use it in my bathroom as a nightlight. It is plugged in (usb) 23/7. Charge doesn't last a long time if it's on continuously. I like it though, it's pretty and has a soft glow to see my bathroom at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were much nicer than expected- purchased for a gift and plan on purchasing another set for myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are really cute lights, almost perfect for nightstand lights with just one drawback... you have to cycle through all the modes to turn it back off, and the last mode it cycles through is max brightness.I'm unsure why they're saying "360 degree irradition angle can easily cause blindness.", I think they're referring to the 360nm wavelength which is bad for your eyes, and got it confused with 360 degree light dispersion. So just ignore that product image.For these lights, they're light weight and simply adorable. Unsure why there's a keychain attached as they're far too big to carry around on your keys, I've removed them (they just unthread). They're battery operated so the plug isn't always needed, but the plug does go up the "backside" of the bird, so that does appear to be a bit awkward, would be nice if it linked in through the base instead.The modes are... off white, white, and blind you at night if you're looking at it (bright). Within the first two modes you can touch and hold the power button to dim or brighten the light, but not with the final mode.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They actually are too bright. Would have loved a softer tone.
reviews.reviewText: They actually are too bright. Would have loved a softer tone.
